<h3 id="X20582">X(20582) = MIDPOINT OF X(2) AND X(141)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^2+5*b^2+5*c^2 : :
<b><br>
X(20582) =  5*X(2)-X(6), 7*X(2)+X(69), 17*X(2)-X(193), 3*X(2)+X(599), 9*X(2)-X(1992), 13*X(2)-5*X(3618), X(2)+7*X(3619), 11*X(2)+5*X(3620), 11*X(2)-X(3629), 13*X(2)+X(3630), 4*X(2)+X(3631), X(2)-5*X(3763), 19*X(2)-3*X(5032), 7*X(2)-2*X(6329), 7*X(2)-X(8584), 15*X(2)+X(11160), 11*X(2)+X(15533)
</b>
<p>
See Antreas Hatzipolakis and César Lozada, <a href="http://www.hyacinthos.epizy.com/message.php?msg=28007"> <b>Hyacinthos 28007</b></a>.
</p>
<p>
X(20582) lies on the these lines:
{2, 6}, {10, 9041}, {30, 14810}, {37, 17225}, {140, 542}, {182, 11539}, {376, 10516}, {511, 547}, {518, 3828}, {519, 3844}, {538, 10007}, {545, 17359}, {549, 1503}, {551, 5846}, {575, 16239}, {594, 17291}, {620, 9830}, {626, 8367}, {635, 5460}, {636, 5459}, {671, 6656}, {698, 9466}, {742, 4755}, {1086, 17292}, {1350, 3545}, {1352, 5054}, {1386, 19883}, {1656, 20423}, {2482, 6292}, {2781, 10170}, {2854, 15082}, {3096, 8370}, {3098, 3845}, {3525, 15069}, {3526, 8550}, {3530, 18553}, {3564, 10124}, {3661, 4395}, {3662, 7227}, {3679, 9053}, {3818, 8703}, {3819, 9019}, {3834, 4472}, {3917, 16776}, {3934, 5461}, {3943, 17305}, {4265, 16858}, {4364, 16676}, {4370, 17254}, {4399, 16706}, {4422, 17237}, {4478, 17228}, {4665, 17290}, {4688, 9055}, {4912, 17355}, {4971, 17382}, {5026, 9167}, {5050, 15723}, {5055, 5480}, {5066, 19924}, {5067, 11477}, {5070, 14848}, {5071, 10519}, {5085, 11180}, {5092, 11812}, {5206, 7822}, {5237, 5463}, {5238, 5464}, {5349, 11304}, {5350, 11303}, {5476, 15699}, {5646, 8547}, {5650, 8705}, {5651, 19127}, {5888, 12367}, {6034, 7944}, {6173, 10022}, {6697, 7734}, {6776, 15709}, {7228, 17289}, {7238, 17227}, {7263, 17293}, {7516, 15582}, {7745, 7883}, {7801, 8362}, {7810, 7819}, {7817, 8364}, {7820, 15810}, {7831, 8598}, {7835, 11149}, {7844, 16509}, {7874, 8787}, {7915, 8365}, {7998, 9971}, {8262, 13857}, {8288, 20385}, {8361, 12815}, {8596, 17128}, {9939, 16895}, {10109, 19130}, {10302, 11054}, {11179, 15694}, {11645, 12100}, {12040, 15482}, {14561, 15703}, {14927, 15705}, {15246, 19596}, {15561, 19905}, {15701, 18440}, {16187, 19136}, {16673, 17243}, {17045, 17231}, {17132, 17235}, {17133, 17229}, {17230, 17395}, {17236, 17340}, {17246, 17285}, {17332, 17357}, {17334, 17358}, {17362, 17370}, {17365, 17371}, {17383, 17388}, {17384, 17390}, {20382, 20384}
</p>
<p>
X(20582) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 141}, {549, 11178}, {597, 599}, {620, 19662}, {3098, 3845}, {3818, 8703}, {3917, 16776}, {8262, 13857}<br>
X(20582) = reflection of X(5092) in X(11812)<br>
X(20582) = complement of X(597)<br>
X(20582) = X(140)-of-anti-Artzt triangle<br>
X(20582) = X(5461)-of-1st Brocard triangle<br>
X(20582) = X(19662)-of-McCay triangle<br>
X(20582) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 599, 597), (2, 7778, 9771), (2, 11184, 15491), (2, 15271, 15597), (6, 599, 11160), (141, 597, 599), (141, 3589, 3631), (141, 3629, 3620), (3619, 3763, 141), (9761, 9763, 9740), (11180, 15702, 5085), (13637, 13757, 14614), (17227, 17369, 7238), (17228, 17366, 4478)<br>
</p>
